item.title: Breaking Barriers: Simplifying Decentralized Onboarding
item.description: Permissionless Blockchains offer a compelling solution for novel applications that operate in a permissionless environment. However, they currently face a daunting dichotomy - although they’re permissionless, they’re notoriously hard to access.
